item.title: The Bishops Are Right to Sue the Federal Government over Refugee Resettlement
item.description: Whatever the outcome of the case, the Catholic Church’s mission to assist legally admitted refugees is clear and convincing.

item.title: Why Zelenskyy keeps pushing for Ukraine NATO membership even though Trump says it's not happening
item.description: Zelenskyy remains adamant about NATO membership for Ukraine because it means that other security guarantees are more likely, experts say.

item.title: Trump’s Pick To Lead The Navy Signals Commitment To Rebuilding America’s Depleted Maritime Fleet
item.description: Rebuilding America's naval fleet will be a priority for the Trump admin, Navy Secretary nominee John Phelan told lawmakers on Thursday.

item.title: GOP Rep. Joe Wilson trumpets 'Make Iraq Great Again!' message
item.description: Republican Rep. Joe Wilson of South Carolina shared the message "Make Iraq Great Again!" The congressman has indicated that Iran controls Iraq.

item.title: Exclusive: Watchdog Group Files Complaint Against Judge For Demanding Gender Quotas Among Litigators
item.description: The Article III Project filed a complaint of misconduct against a judge in Florida for demanding sex be criteria for legal representation.

item.title: A Modest Republican Budget Plan
item.description: Far from being draconian, the House-passed budget resolution would cut spending by a relatively small amount.

item.title: Trump Should Take a Bite out of Nonsensical Laws
item.description: An insane number of things are classified as federal crimes, and that doesn’t even include the labyrinth of federal rules Americans are subject to.

item.description: President Donald Trump appointed Hung Cao to under secretary of the Navy and Paul Dabbar to deputy secretary of commerce late Thursday.
